meanings.definition: A coming together of people or things.
meanings.sent1: Family gatherings are fun times to be together.
meanings.sent2: The town hall gatherings were well attended by the community.
meanings.sent3: The gatherings of toys in the playroom made it look like a toy store.
meanings.sent4: The gatherings of stars in the night sky created a beautiful constellation.
meanings.sent5: The gatherings of colorful balloons at the party made it festive.

meanings.definition: The act of collecting or assembling.
meanings.sent1: Her hobby involved the gatherings of stamps from around the world.
meanings.sent2: The gatherings of data for the research project took weeks to complete.
meanings.sent3: The gatherings of ingredients for the recipe were meticulously organized.
meanings.sent4: The gatherings of books on the shelf made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent5: The gatherings of seashells on the beach were a delight to discover.
